column1: However, it is worthy to note that in order for the Petitioner to be successful in a
writ of certiorari quashing the decision in ෙැ6, the Petitioner ought to establish that
the decision of the 1st Respondent not to recommend the renewal was tainted with
irrationality, illegality, unreasonableness or procedural impropriety or any ground
for judicial review. However, the Petitioner in his application for a writ of certiorari
has failed to establish the aforementioned elements in order to successfully obtain
